title.english: By the Grace of the Gods

description:
Only 39 years into a life full of bad luck, Ryouma Takebayashi passes away in his sleep! Taking pity on him, three divine beings show compassion by reincarnating him as a young boy to a magical, new world.

Now he spends his time researching and caring for slimes. But after healing an injured traveler, Ryouma decides to set out with his new friends on a journey to use his power to help others.

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: The man picked up by the gods
เพราะพระเจ้าเลือกเลยได้เกิดใหม่มาเลี้ยงสไลม์ในต่างโลก

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Creature Taming
tags.description: Features the taming of animals, monsters, or other creatures.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Outdoor Activities
tags.description: Centers around hiking, camping or other outdoor activities.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

node.description:
[Profile](www.horipro-international.com/artist/musician/tadokoro) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/azusa-tadokoro) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/AzusaTadokoro) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/azusa_tadokoro/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/tadokoroazusaofficial)

She was a member in the tennis club at her middle and high schools, and she was also the general manager of the club in high school. When Azusa was in 8th grade, she was inspired to become a voice actress after hearing the Akiko Yajima's performance as Kohaku in Inuyasha. She participated in Horipro's 36th Talent Scout Caravan on October 11, 2011, was awarded as the grand prix winner and made her debut as a voice actress in 2012. In 2014, she made her official debut as a singer with the album "Beyond Myself!".

Azusa's hobbies including karaoke, impersonating, making albums, cooking and sewing. Her special skills include tennis - which she has been playing ever since fifth grade of elementary school - and arm wrestling, and she likes to stay healthy. She also loves both cows and movies, and has said that her ideal date would be either tennis or a movie so that she wouldn’t have to talk a lot. Azusa has four older brothers, and she went to the same high school as [Megumi Nakajima](https://anilist.co/staff/96105/Megumi-Nakajima)

(Source: BanG Dream! Wikia)

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/MindaRynOfficial) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mindaryn_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/mindaryn_/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/MindaRyn/)

A Thai YouTuber known for singing anisong covers. She has gone on to perform the theme songs to several anime series.

Jad is an American voice actress and ADR director who works for Funimation and Sentai Filmworks. Her name is an acronym of her parents' names, Jimmy and David, and is pronounced as Jade. Her singing led to her first voice role in Sasami: Magical Girls Club as Eimi Mori, and her first major voice role was Masako Hara in Ghost Hunt. She graduated summa cum laude from Texas Wesleyan University with a Bachelor of Arts in Music in 2005.

(Source: Wikipedia)
ADR Engineer at FUNimation Entertainment, however has since expanded to also being a Mixing Engineer.
Tyler Walker is an ADR Director, Script writer and voice actor for FUNimation.

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/guimarques78/) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/guimarques78)

Guilherme Marques is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, and architect.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Dickon Tarly (Game of Thrones)
- Antonio Garcia / Gold Samurai Ranger (2nd voice; Power Rangers: Samurai)
- Shisui Uchiha (Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4 and Naruto X Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections)
- Mr. Phillip Frond (2nd voice - 2nd season onwards; Bob's Burgers)
- Travis Marshall (Dexter)
- Pietro Maximoff / Quiksilver (LEGO Marvel's Avengers)
- Joseph Turner (Call of Duty: WWII)
- George Takei (2nd voice; Futurama)
- Harald Fairhair (Assassin's Creed Valhalla)
- Chief (2nd dub; The Fox and the Hound)
- Amang Paso and Bantay (Trese)
- Sergeant Kong Chul-Ho (Descendants of the Sun)
- Joseph Campbell (Rick and Morty)
- Ricpon (Power Rangers Ninja Steel)
- David Hasselhoff (Close Enough)
!~

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/jonasfalcao82/)

Jonas Falcão is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director and singer.
